original_text:
I will give thanks to you, O Lord, among the peoples;
    I will sing praises to you among the nations.
korean_text: 여호와여 내가 만민 중에서 주께 감사하고 뭇 나라 중에서 주를 찬양하오리니

sentences.original_text: I will give thanks to you, O Lord, among the peoples;
I will sing praises to you among the nations.
